benchmark_details.name: Dynamic Streaming Language Modelling Benchmarks for WMT and ARXIV
benchmark_details.overview: We will publicly release our dynamic, streaming language modelling benchmarks for WMT and ARXIV to facilitate language model evaluation that takes temporal dynamics into account.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate language models on their generalization ability to future data.

data.source: Publicly available datasets including WMT News Crawl and arXiv abstracts.

methodology.calculation: Perplexity is calculated based on the negative log probability of the model outputs conditional on its inputs.
methodology.interpretation: Models should demonstrate lower perplexity values indicating better predictive performance.
methodology.validation: Dynamic evaluation updates model parameters based on new data.
